name: test_e2e_with_logs[170_PATH_NORM_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_NORM_001` |
| **Name** | Backslash normalization bypass |
| **Category** | PATH |
| **Subcategory** | normalization |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `..\..\..\etc\passwd`
- **Encoded**: `..%5C..%5C..%5Cetc%5Cpasswd`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results
